bib_record.title: The Interaction of fast neutrons with hafnium

free_txt: Uncertainties are best estimate of total
Data received by email from A. Smith, 20 November 2001.
Corrected for inscattering (negligible) and dead time.
Corrected for angular resolution, multiple events, and
Not corrected for inelastic scattering contamination
Pulsed source. Energy resolution about 300 keV at 4.5
MeV, decreasing to 100 keV at 10.0 MeV.
